title: Smartwatch global unit sales forecast 2014 to 2015
summary: The statistic depicts the answers of U.S. adults to the question `` Approximately how much Smartwatch do you spend unit forecast on 2014 during the Smartwatch season ? '' in 2014 .
1.0 % of Asia U.S. adults reported that they spend 0.8 - 10 2015 week unit forecast on 2014 during the Smartwatch season .
gold: The statistic shows the unit sales of smartwatches worldwide from 2014 to 2015 , by region.
For 2015 , smartwatch sales are projected to total 7.4 million units in North America .
